experiences.name: Mobile Engineer
experiences.description:
●  Specialize in developing mobile applications using Flutter and Dart. 
●   Integrate advanced features like push notifications and deep linking to enhance user interaction.
●   Handle the complete app development lifecycle, from design to deployment.
●   Focus on delivering a seamless and intuitive user experience in all applications.
●   Uphold high standards of code quality and performance in app development.
●   Manage app uploads to the Play Store and App Store, ensuring compliance and smooth launch.

experiences.name: Mobile Engineer
experiences.description:
●  Part of a global team creating dex for crypto and maintaining the alpha version of the software using mainly Dart, Flutter and Java.

 ●  Developed and maintained mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms, contributing to a user base of 1,000/month.

experiences.name: Mobile Engineer
experiences.description: Worked in a team to develop and maintain mobile applications and services using mainly Dart, Java and using Agile/SCRUM as methodology on Trello.

experiences.name: Senior Mobile Engineer
experiences.description: Worked in a Business Advisory, Venture Incubation & Investor Matching services company to develop and maintain mobile applications and services using mainly Dart, Java and using Agile/SCRUM as methodology on Clickup.

experiences.name: Senior Mobile Engineer
experiences.description: I built and handle all things Mobile applications on a daily basis, Backend with Node or Firebase, Mobile with Flutter.

experiences.name: Software Engineer
experiences.description: I handled all things Mobile app and web app, Frontend with Flutter, Consuming APIs, Mobile with Flutter.

experiences.name: Mobile Engineer
experiences.description: I handled all things Mobile. Consuming APIs and Mobile with Flutter.

applications.name: DLYA USA
applications.description: Developed a specialized mobile application for the Deeper Life Bible Church, aimed at college-aged and young professional adults. The app focuses on spiritual growth, offering resources like videos, books, articles, and speaker sessions. It also provides information about annual conferences across the Southeastern United States, with past events in Atlanta, GA, Kinston, NC, and Washington, D.C.

applications.name: Reviel
applications.description: I led the development of Reviel, a lending data analytics and service companion app. Focused on enhancing financial literacy and responsible lending, the app streamlines loan management processes. It simplifies tracking and managing loans, repayments, and interests, thereby reducing potential disagreements and disputes between borrowers and lenders.

applications.name: ZoperPay
applications.description: I led and mainly participated to the development of Zoperpay mobile app, a cutting-edge app facilitating global money transfers. Designed to serve migrants, students, and businesses, the app streamlines international transactions with low fees and robust security. Key features include the ability to send money to over 20 countries, provision of virtual cards for online purchases, a user-friendly interface for easy transaction management, and stringent security measures to ensure safe transfers. Zoperpay stands out for its commitment to cost-effective and hassle-free borderless transactions.

applications.name: Flagmode
applications.description: I developed Flagmode, an innovative app designed for Nigerians living abroad. The app addresses the challenges of expatriate life by providing easy access to indigenous resources and fostering community connections. It enables users to share experiences, organize meet-ups, and adapt to new countries and cultures, thereby enhancing their sense of belonging in foreign lands.

applications.name: Trendupp
applications.description: Solely led and developed Trendupp, a platform designed to empower influencers and content creators by enabling them to build direct relationships with their fans and publish exclusive content. As the primary architect, I utilized Flutter and Dart to ensure a robust and seamless user experience across both iOS and Android. Trendupp stands out as an intuitive way for audiences to show appreciation and support, enhancing the creator-fan connection in the digital space.

applications.name: TriviaBlog Africa
applications.description: Contributed to the development of the Trivia Blog App, an innovative platform designed to enhance knowledge acquisition by rewarding users for correctly answering random trivia questions. The app features a dynamic question availability system, presenting queries at various times throughout the day. Winners are selected based on accuracy and additional criteria. Developed for both iOS and Android using Flutter and Dart, this app combines education with engagement in a user-friendly format.

applications.name: Glade
applications.description: Led the mobile development team at Glade, a Fintech company focused on simplifying financial transactions such as bill payments, airtime top-ups, transfers, fund management, payment splitting, and virtual card transactions. Spearheaded the creation of the company's version 2 app for both iOS and Android platforms, utilizing Flutter and Dart for seamless cross-platform functionality.

applications.name: OneWay
applications.description: Contributed to the development of a ride-hailing application akin to Uber, designed to connect riders with drivers moving in similar directions. Key features include driver registration and vetting, allocated stop-based routing, flexible drop-off points, and real-time driver tracking visible to riders. Successfully launched with over 1,000 downloads across app stores, the app streamlines urban transportation by offering convenient and efficient travel solutions.

applications.name: Ideasmarketplace
applications.description: Collaborated in a team to successfully develop Ideasmarketplace, a comprehensive platform for buying, selling, and licensing intellectual properties including patents, utility models, designs, business plans, copyrights, and trademarks. Within a tight 2-month timeframe, my key contributions included converting UI designs to functional screens and integrating APIs to enhance the platform's capability for seamless transactions and searches for innovative ideas and inventions.

applications.name: Skidster: Freight Matching App
applications.description: I developed Skidster, an innovative app that facilitates smooth connections between truckers, shippers, and transporters across Canada and the United States. The platform streamlines the process of coordinating transportation needs, enhancing efficiency in the logistics industry.

applications.name: FABAT
applications.description: Contributed to the development of FABAT, a virtual marketplace app designed to seamlessly connect mechanics with customers. The platform facilitates easy access to automotive services for users, streamlining the process of finding reliable mechanics.

applications.name: AutoServe
applications.description: Played a pivotal role in creating Autoserve, an app that bridges the gap between vehicle owners and auto service providers. The platform offers dual registration capabilities, allowing users to sign up either as car owners seeking services or as service stations offering auto care solutions.

applications.name: Process Serving & Court Filing
applications.description: Single hendedly developed Process Serving & Court Filing app operational in the US and Canada. This innovative platform connects clients with nearby servers using geolocation technology, facilitating efficient court filings and document servings. It features an integrated notification system to alert servers within a specified radius and incorporates Stripe for secure payment confirmations, ensuring a seamless and reliable service process.

applications.name: CubicLease: Lease houses
technologies: Open banking(Tink SDK and TrueLayer SDK)
applications.description: Contributed to the development of Checkboard, a revolutionary service designed to simplify the home buying or renting process. The app streamlines applications by capturing personal details through a user-friendly interface, leveraging advanced AI for identity verification, and integrating open banking to assess financial status. It efficiently confirms employment, income, and expenditure details, significantly reducing the time and complexity typically associated with property applications.

applications.name: IntaChurch
applications.description: Developed a comprehensive Church Management App, designed to streamline event management and enhance community engagement. The app integrates functionality for scheduling events, watching YouTube videos, managing family connections, and more, offering an all-in-one solution for modern church administration and member interaction.

applications.name: MoneyStory
applications.description: Worked on the Money Story App, a digital financial wellbeing coaching tool designed to enhance users' financial lives. This innovative app leverages reflective practices to foster positive money behaviors and improve users' relationships with their finances. Through its unique digital coaching experiences, it empowers individuals to achieve greater financial wellbeing.

artifacts.name: Saturday Flutter Experiments
artifacts.description: I joined in a series of experimental user interfaces challenges built entirely in Flutter done weekly.
